body.name: Arm & Hammer Plus Odor Blasters 5in1 42ct (4x42ct), 168 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 48 mins
features: America’s #1 Odor Removal Detergent* *CHURCH & DWIGHT calculation based in part on data reported by NielsenIQ through its ScanTrack Service for TOTAL LAUNDRY DETERGENTS, BRANDS WITH ODOR BENEFIT for the 52-week period ending 12/26/2020, for the total U.S. market, xAOC, according to the NielsenIQ standard product hierarchy. Copyright 2021, Nielsen Consumer LLC.

Deep Cleaning ARM & HAMMER Detergent Is Powered By OxiClean: America’s #1 stain fighter Additive Brand* combines with our trusted laundry detergent and Odor Blasters in a single Power Pak formulated to get out tough stains and odors(*based on units sold)

6 Powerful Cleaning Benefits: deep cleaning laundry detergent paks eliminate tough odors, feature a hard-working stain remover to attack 100+ stains, whiten whites, brighten colors, and freshen with long-lasting scent booster for clean-smelling clothes

Odor Blasters Attack Tough Odors: our laundry soap is formulated to attack odors from musty towels, body odor, wet dog, pet odors, and damp clothes smell; our Power Paks refresh stinky athletic uniforms and smelly workout gear

No Measuring, Mess Or Spills: convenient pre-measured laundry pods combine concentrated clean laundry detergent with stain remover plus Odor Booster in a single pak. Use two Power Paks for large, heavily soiled loads or tough odors; use one Power Pak for regular or lightly soiled loads
body.description: ARM & HAMMER™ Plus OxiClean™ with Odor Blasters 5-in-1 Power Paks offer 5 powerful cleaning benefits in 1: odor elimination, deep cleaning, whitening whites, brightening colors, with a powerful fresh scent booster. Odor Blasters is specially formulated to eliminate tough odors like body odor, sweat and musty towels by attacking them at their core, leaving clothes clean and smelling great with a long-lasting Fresh Burst scent. Get effective cleaning power with ARM & HAMMER™ Plus OxiClean™ with Odor Blasters 5-in-1 Power Paks. Our powerful formula is designed to work in cold and hot water as well as all machines including high efficiency (HE). Drop one in today!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us A trusted solution for more than 170 years. Pure and simple. Versatile and affordable. Gentle yet powerful. For generations of families, ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda has been the standard of purity, and a trusted household staple in millions of cabinets and pantries. Year after year, ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda has earned its place as a Trusted Baking Soda brand by helping families master nearly every household task, from cooking and cleaning to pet care and personal care.

This trust is built upon our commitment to purity and quality, and is appreciated by consumers today who value alternatives to products with harsh chemicals. That's why ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda is a natural, effective for taking care of every room in the house. It's also a natural choice for taking care of every member of your family. Our laundry, cat litter, toothpastes and personal care products are made with ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, delivering the quality you can count on, from the brand you trust.

This trust is built upon our commitment to purity and quality, and is appreciated by consumers today who value alternatives to products with harsh chemicals. That's why ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda is a natural, effective for taking care of every room in the house. It's also a natural choice for taking care of every member of your family. Our laundry, cat litter, toothpastes and personal care products are made with ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, delivering the quality you can count on, from the brand you trust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was using Arm and Hammer liquid with oxy clean and odor blasters which is great but I was tired of the heavy bottles and recycling so I thought I'd try these 5 in 1 pods. So easy no mess and my clothes come out very clean,stain and odor free and no more plastic bottles but the same great product. I LOVE THESE! I use dryer balls in the dryer to add extra softening although I don't need to. I will be only using these Arm and Hammer 5 in 1 laundry pods with odor blasters and oxy clean, pods.from now on!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Laundry Detergent
reviews.reviewText: Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean With Odor Blasters LAUNDRY DETERGENT 5-IN-1 Power Paks cleans my clothes better than any other brand.Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean does a fantastic job of cleaning my clothes, including the removal of tough stains. It leaves the clothes smelling fresh and clean without adding a heavy 'perfume' odor.There are other versions of this Arm & Hammer detergent, but they don't work as well as this version here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Gets rid of the smell on my husbands work clothes so that’s awesome and it’s a good value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My wife likes these pods. More convenient than the jugs and do clean well in cold water!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seems to work well but not that great on stinky work out clothes
reviews.reviewText: Problem with any of these soap pods is if you just have one garment to wash, say a new shirt or new pair of pants, you have to use a whole pod when if you had liquid detergent just a tablespoon would probably do. As far as odor blasters, meh! I will still order this multi pack again if available. Way cheaper than the grocery store and even though there is just 2 of us, we probably wash a load of clothes per day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the scent my clothes have. I'm often asked what perfume I'm wearing because it has a light clean smell-I don't wear perfume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works and great value!!!
reviews.reviewText: I love the way this cleans my family of 5 clothes… can’t beat this deal. I’m a subscribe and save mama, so I get 15% off. This gets stains out of my football players clothes (age 17) and my 1st graders active, “mud loving, grass staining, arts and craft… can’t find a better place to clean his painted hands on except his clothes… 6 y/o stained clothes. I am amazed by what this does… oh and did I mention, my husband is a contractor and comes home in the grossest of dirt, concrete, mud, paint, etc… well on those days I just pop two pods in and add a little pinesol to the fabric softener cycle… his clothes look brand new!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great value. Have been using arm & hammer for decades to wash my clothes.
Nice smell nice clean Nice price

Using these pods really remove tough odors such as cat pee and sweat odors on the clothes. Previously I had to rewash some of the clothes that has stubborn odors but after using these, just one wash and it does the job. Save my bills too
The gel outers don’t dissolve properly and leave residue all over clothes. Nice smell though
It does not remove the smell of sweat completely especially on the armpit areas
